title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport) (No. 2) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department transport tourism sport) (no 2) order 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Denise Duffy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Denise Duffy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport, is appointed to be a 
Special Adviser to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department 
of Transport, Tourism and Sport with effect from 7 August 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [467] 3
